text: Segrià officially in Catalan or Segriá in Spanish is a comarca (county) in the west of Catalonia, Spain, bordering Aragon. , over two thirds of its population live in the capital city of Lleida, which is also Catalonia's sixth largest municipality, and remains the most populated comarca in the Lleida province. It takes its name from the river Segre. == Municipalities == {| class="wikitable sortable" ! Municipality ! Population(2014) !
